item.title: Shigu Insurrection [02]: Motivation
item.description: The red has seized control over the blue. How can the blue rise up to the surface and initiate the rebellion? What drives the inferior to fight against the supremacy? Read the summary here. Motivation Having fear that his red hand is waking up, the blue boy Sig pulled himself out of the cafe team and ran off to the ruins. And just as he feared, it took him over. A witness who encountered Sig’s red alter ego said that he is not the usual shigu.

item.title: Shigu Insurrection [01]: Background
item.description: When the red overtakes the blue, it seems like that all hope is lost. But can the blue team get it together and restore the balance within? WARNING: This article may be quite long. Skip here to read the summary. Introduction This is a reflection of my current state of mind. A rewind to the moments in the last 6 months. Tides come and go, high and low. Rainbow cycles color from blue to red, and back again.

item.title: Hello
item.description: First content written here, nothing to see at the moment.
